text:
Maurice Rajsfus (9 April 1928 – 13 June 2020) was a French writer, journalist and historian. He was the author of many books talking about the themes such as the Jewish genocide in France, the police, and attacks on civil rights.
In 1994 he co-founded the "Observatory of Public Liberties" ("l'Observatoire des libertés publiques"), which he led.
